name: Blood Bullets: Escape the Cave
description:
Blood Bullets: Escape the Cave is a top-down pixel art shooter. In this game, you will attempt to make it past all 3 waves of enemies without running out of health. However, there is a twist: Your health is also your ammo. Each enemy is one-shot, but only drops one bullet. Be careful, every shot counts.

This game was made as an entry to the Mini Game Jam 128: Health. If you play it within the rating period, please don't forget to rate the game and give your honest opinion and feedback in the comments. Thanks for playing!
